Incredible food!  Started with Gazpacho, which was delicious.  The Pappardellisimi, which is pasta with cooked vegetables, was very very good!  The Apple Crumble with vanilla ice cream dessert was good.  A lot of crumble :-)  The ice cream could have been a slightly bigger scoop to accommodate it all.  I was way full by now and this dessert is good for two to share after that much food.The restaurant has a nice decor and a cozy atmosphere.  Service was great.  There are English menus and folks know enough English to help you out.You got to try this out if you are in Barcelona and are not bent upon eating meat.
